post.body: yeah! now I have a cute hair cut (thanks to Heidi Klum's inspiration) and @mjhoke got a yummy homemade tofu fried rice meal!
- love love love your work!! fellow tweeps, see it for yourself: vintagerehab.blogspot.com
LOOOOOOVE Kings of Leon...
The clickwheel on my 3-y-o BB officially surrendered this weekend. No sending/responding to texts/emails until I get my new one next wk.
Excited for Festivus tonight!
Excited about dinner with Chris at Cabo Fish Taco tonight! Yum! cabofishtaco.com
Its 70 degrees here today. In December. So strange.
is thankful for all the Good Luck wishes I received this morning!
uh oh - the boyfriend will be upset about this. http://tinyurl.com/3lc4da He loves this stuff.
getting ready to meet a Bride who's wedding I'm styling - she's saying "I do" in St. Simons in June!
just got my Elf on A Shelf - thanks to the HARO contest - SO cute!
weekly music spotlight: http://www.popcoast2coast.com/?p=428
What part of "I would like to cancel my service" do people not understand?????
Took some serious cold meds. Headed to bed. Oh, and thanks to @mjhoke, I'm loving my new haircut :)
Feeling horrible... Where is that Tylenol cold?
NOT surprising http://www.th3hills.com/story-bar/4673/
my twitter is acting up. I think I just DMd @emmyowens three times! whoops!
Is making dinner tonight in trade for a free haircut from my fabulous hairstylist friend Meredith. Hey, times are tough, people.
Loving the Kanye "Heartless" jam
Headed to meet @ivyrobinson for coffee @ Starbucks!
